::Spears::

She looked at Ramulas,"You died?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm/Rex/Ramulus::
> 
> Rex nods, looking at the prisoners.
> 
> "Allright," he says, "Here are the procedures: you give us all your 
weapons, 
> we scan subspace to see if you have any more, and then we escort 
you to the 
> brig. ANY scanning once inside the base will result in termination 
by the 
> autoguns, so don't do it. A trial will be held later."
> 
> The two continue on their way, nearing the Cybertronian Fire.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus nods as he recieves Brix's message. "Allright, he 
responds, "I'll be 
> in the area."
> 
> He looks at Spears. "When I first came online, I was in a 
mountonous area on 
> this planet. In a few years, I stumbled on the Predacons, and have 
been in 
> the war ever since. Except for a brief period when I died."
